scripts.convert-png: find public -type f \( -name '*.PNG' -o -name '*.png' \) | while read -r file; do ext="${file##*.}"; if [ "$ext" = 'PNG' ]; then mv "$file" "${file%.PNG}.png"; fi; done && files="$(find public -type f -name '*.png')" && [ -z "$files" ] && exit 0 || (echo "$files" && echo '上記のファイルを変換します。中止するならCtrl-C (5秒待機)' && sleep 5 && echo "$files" | while read -r file; do cwebp -quiet "$file" -o "${file%.png}.webp" && rm "$file"; done)
scripts.convert-heic: find public -type f \( -name '*.HEIC' -o -name '*.heic' \) | while read -r file; do ext="${file##*.}"; if [ "$ext" = 'HEIC' ]; then mv "$file" "${file%.HEIC}.heic"; fi; done && files="$(find public -type f -name '*.heic')" && [ -z "$files" ] && exit 0 || (echo "$files" && echo '上記のファイルを変換します。中止するならCtrl-C (5秒待機)' && sleep 5 && echo "$files" | while read -r file; do heif-convert "$file" "${file%.heic}.png" && rm "$file"; done)
